text: Sadqay sirf faqeeron kay liye hain aur miskeenon kay liye aur inn kay wasool kerney walon kay liye aur unn kay liye jin kay dil parchaye jatay hon aur gardan churaney mein aur qaraz daron kay liye aur Allah ki raah mein aur raah ro musafiron kay liye farz hai Allah ki taraf say aur Allah ilm-o-hikmat wala hai
